priorVersion.title: CDISC Questionnaire GOSE Test Name Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C115403

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire GOSE Test Name Terminology

definition: Extended Glasgow Outcome Scale test name.
name: Extended Glasgow Outcome Scale Questionnaire Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire GOSE Test Name Terminology
synonyms: Extended Glasgow Outcome Scale Questionnaire Test Name

terms.definition: Extended Glasgow Outcome Scale - Are they currently able to work to their previous capacity?
terms.preferredTerm: GOSE - Work: Able to Work to Previous Capacity
terms.submissionValue: GOSE1-Able to Work to Previous Capacity
synonyms: GOSE1-Able to Work to Previous Capacity

terms.definition: Extended Glasgow Outcome Scale - Was assistance at home essential before the injury?
terms.preferredTerm: GOSE - Independence in the Home: Assistance at Home Before Injury

terms.definition: Extended Glasgow Outcome Scale - Have they been told that they are currently at risk of developing epilepsy?
terms.preferredTerm: GOSE - Epilepsy: At Risk of Developing Epilepsy

terms.definition: Extended Glasgow Outcome Scale - Is the assistance of another person at home essential every day for some activities of daily living?
terms.preferredTerm: GOSE - Independence in the Home: Assistance Essential for Daily Living

terms.definition: Extended Glasgow Outcome Scale - Have there been psychological problems which have resulted in ongoing family disruption or disruption to friendships?
terms.preferredTerm: GOSE - Family and Friendships: Disruptive Psychological Problems

terms.definition: Extended Glasgow Outcome Scale - Did they engage in regular social and leisure activities outside home before the injury?
terms.preferredTerm: GOSE - Social and Leisure Activities: Engage Regular Social and Leisure Activities Before Injury

terms.definition: Extended Glasgow Outcome Scale - What has been the extent of disruption or strain?
terms.preferredTerm: GOSE - Family and Friendships: Extent of Disruption or Strain

terms.definition: Extended Glasgow Outcome Scale - What is the extent of restriction on their social and leisure activities?
terms.preferredTerm: GOSE - Social and Leisure Activities: Extent of Restriction on Social and Leisure Activities

terms.definition: Extended Glasgow Outcome Scale - Were there problems with family or friends before the injury?
terms.preferredTerm: GOSE - Family and Friendships: Problems with Family or Friends Before Injury

terms.definition: Extended Glasgow Outcome Scale - Scoring: The patient's overall rating is based on the lowest outcome category indicated on the scale.
terms.preferredTerm: GOSE - GOSE Overall Score

terms.definition: Extended Glasgow Outcome Scale - How restricted are they?
terms.preferredTerm: GOSE - Work: How Restricted Are They

terms.definition: Extended Glasgow Outcome Scale - What is the most important factor in outcome?
terms.preferredTerm: GOSE - Epilepsy: Most Important Factor in Outcome

terms.definition: Extended Glasgow Outcome Scale - Do they need frequent help or someone to be around at home most of the time?
terms.preferredTerm: GOSE - Independence in the Home: Need Frequent Help at Home

terms.definition: Extended Glasgow Outcome Scale - Is the head injured person able to obey simple commands, or say any words?
terms.preferredTerm: GOSE - Consciousness: Obey Simple Commands
terms.submissionValue: GOSE1-Obey Simple Commands or Say Words
synonyms: GOSE1-Obey Simple Commands or Say Words

terms.definition: Extended Glasgow Outcome Scale - Are there any other current problems relating to the injury which affect daily life?
terms.preferredTerm: GOSE - Return to Normal Life: Other Current Problems Relating to Injury

terms.definition: Extended Glasgow Outcome Scale - Are they able to resume regular social and leisure activities outside home?
terms.preferredTerm: GOSE - Social and Leisure Activities: Resume Regular Social and Leisure Activities

terms.definition: Extended Glasgow Outcome Scale - Were they able to shop without assistance before the injury?
terms.preferredTerm: GOSE - Independence Outside the Home: Able to Shop Without Assistance Before Injury

terms.definition: Extended Glasgow Outcome Scale - Are they able to shop without assistance?
terms.preferredTerm: GOSE - Independence Outside the Home: Able to Shop Without Assistance

terms.definition: Extended Glasgow Outcome Scale - Were similar problems present before the injury?
terms.preferredTerm: GOSE - Return to Normal Life: Similar Problems Before Injury

terms.definition: Extended Glasgow Outcome Scale - Since the injury has the head injured person had any epileptic fits?
terms.preferredTerm: GOSE - Epilepsy: Since Injury Any Epileptic Fits

terms.definition: Extended Glasgow Outcome Scale - Are they able to travel locally without assistance?
terms.preferredTerm: GOSE - Independence Outside the Home: Travel Locally Without Assistance

terms.definition: Extended Glasgow Outcome Scale - Were they able to travel without assistance before the injury?
terms.preferredTerm: GOSE - Independence Outside the Home: Travel Locally Without Assistance Before Injury

terms.definition: Extended Glasgow Outcome Scale - Were they either working or seeking employment before the injury (answer 'yes') or were they doing neither (answer 'no')?
terms.preferredTerm: GOSE - Work: Working or Seeking Employment Before the Injury
